english_example_sentence: You always stay calm in difficult events and moments.
russian_example_sentence: Вы всегда остаётесь спокойными в сложных событиях и моментах.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz her zaman zorlu olaylarda ve anlarda sakin kalırsınız.
